categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Barleos Choid was a male human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire at the time of the Galactic War. During the Dread War, he was stationed on the moon Oricon's surface as a supply officer specializing in captured goods for the Dread Executioners.

Barleos Choid was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.4: The Dread War. He serves as the Reputation Vendor for the Dread Executioners, the Imperial version of the reputation group on Oricon.
